fields.name: pan
fields.label: Pan Angle
fields.description: Rotation of the camera around its vertical axis (i.e., causing the image to translate along its horizontal axis)

fields.name: tilt
fields.label: Pan Angle
fields.description: Rotation of the camera around its horizontal axis (i.e., causing the image to translate along its vertical axis)

fields.name: zoom
fields.label: Zoom Factor
fields.description: Amount of zoom, 0 being the highest FOV and 100 being the lowest
